description:
The Rothenberg Law Firm LLP in New York, New York, is built on a decades-long legacy of success in personal injury law. The compensation we have won for injured clients numbers well into the hundreds of millions of dollars. This impressive record reflects the determination, preparation and passion we bring to every case.

Our Commitment To You – 'The Rothenberg Way'

After enduring the nightmare of an accident, the last thing you need is a lawyer who won’t take your case seriously – or who treats you as just another file in a stack of many.

At The Rothenberg Law Firm, we aren’t a personal injury mill. On the contrary, when we take on a case, our attorneys prepare to go to battle – through aggressive negotiations or trial, if needed. We will invest the time, resources and “sweat equity” necessary to go the distance.

Get The Support You Need To Piece Life Back Together

We understand the life-shattering impact of serious accidents and injuries. Our hope is that, here, you will feel like family. Our lawyers and staff will not only be your foremost legal champions; we will also make sure you have the holistic support and guidance you need to start healing and piecing your life back together.

We know that securing justice requires tireless determination – and we believe it’s well worth it.

Get In Touch

Learn more about what makes us one of the nation’s premier personal injury firms. Call 800-697-9967 for a free consultation. We have convenient offices in New York, New Jersey and Philadelphia.
